Review Rating Land Rover has taken all its off-road knowledge and put it into an upmarket package to create the excellent Freelander 2. Premium feel Practical family car Off-road ability Chunky styling Refined on the move Premium prices compared to similar off roaders Narrow boot Average Owner Review Its load area and wide doors. Fantastic towing capacity and ground clearance. Review provided by: The following features are fitted on this car...
